titleStmt.title: John W. Finnell to Edwin M. Stanton
CWG14476

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: Handwritten Transcriptions of Civil War Telegrams

body.p:
Hon E. M. Stanton
Sec'y of War
Washington

The eleventh section of act of Congress appeared July 17th 1862 has been my guide in organizing the new Cavalry regiments raised in Kentucky Genl Order No 126. A.G.O of 6th instant; prescribes a different plan of organization -- To which shallÂ I conform

By order of the Govenor
Jno. W. Finnell
Adj Gen Ky Vols
